title: Big Global Events Will Help To Spark Consumer Spending: Telsey
description: Dana Telsey, CEO and Chief Research Officer at Telsey Advisory Group talks about her outlook for retail sector into 2026. She mentioned how there are many big global events in 2026 like the Winter Olympics, FIFA World Cup, and America 250, that could drive consumer interest and spending. She joined the conversation on "Bloomberg Markets" with Scarlet Fu.  (Source: Bloomberg)
